info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 3:29PM EDT until April 05 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Tornado Warning for portions of... Screven County in southeastern Georgia... Allendale County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hilltonia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include: Allendale, Sylvania, Fairfax, Hiltonia, Sycamore, Ulmer, Altman, Seigling, Martin, Barton, Millhaven, Hilltonia, Millett, Appleton and Burtons Ferry Landing. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
